param.name: makeConfigCompetible
param.label: Make Config Competible To J1.5,1.6 and 1.7
param.description: Automatic Conversion of config.xml file at the time of generate to make fit for Joomla 1.5, 1.6 and 1.7
param.option: No, I will Myslef add param and fieldset tags in config.xml
